condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2019, the political and programmatic environment, including coordination, partnership and governance (national and local), is strengthened.

description.narrative: In 2019, leadership and governance mechanisms were strengthened through the establishment of thematic health groups to monitor the 2015–2024 National Health Development Plan (PNDS in French), the organization of joint integrated supervision of target contracts and the update of national policy documents on community health, HIV/AIDS and nutrition. Joint advocacy and partnership efforts influenced strategic planning and mobilized additional resources for nutrition and community health. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Amount of counterpart funds mobilized by the government for the Water and Sanitation sector
Number of new laws, policies, and sector strategies validated, adopted and disseminated
Number of revised and disseminated sectoral policy and strategy documents

Number of transformative partnerships (community networks, civil society, women, religious denominations, private, parliamentary, academic) established/renewed that support the delivery of health facilities (health care centers (HCCs) and health posts (HPs)) for the provision of quality integrated services in the "40 communes de convergence"
Number of coordination structures set up for the management of COVID 19
Number of policy documents, guidelines on continuity of care in the management of COVID 19 elaborated and disseminated
Existence of national protocols for the management of SAM based on WHO standards
Country has a budgeted plan to eliminate water and fluids to support increase in exclusive breastfeeding
Country has a budgeted plan to improve dietary diversity
Existence of functioning sector coordination mechanism for water, sanitation and hygiene

baseline.value: Partially - Existence of technical group led by SNAPE

target.value: 2019:Yes - Existence and functioning national WASH coordination platform led by MEH

title.narrative: National strategy to eliminate open defecation available with a systemic approach to gender

baseline.value: Yes - Existence of national CLTS strategy document

target.value: 2019:Yes (Update) - Existence of CLTS acceleration plan for Guinea ODF in 2022

title.narrative: National HIV Strategic plan/guidance for care and treatment that are aligned to Global targets and the most recent WHO recommendations for care and treatment of children , adolescents and pregnant/breast feeding women
Existence of Every Newborn Action Plan (ENAP).
